mapper.sql: id, project_id, host_id, port, server_name, create_time, update_time, del_flg, create_id, update_id
mapper.select:
select count(distinct t4.ip,t4.port) as port_num from scan_project t1 join scan_project_host t2 on t2.project_id = t1.id join scan_host t3 on t3.domain = t2.`host` join scan_port t4 on t4.ip = t3.ip where t1.del_flg = 0 and t3.del_flg = 0 and t4.del_flg = 0
and t1.user_id = #{userId}

select
'项目' as tag_name, t1.name as tag, t1.id as tag_value
'企业' as tag_name, t3.company as tag, t3.company as tag_value
'主域名' as tag_name, t3.parent_domain as tag, t3.parent_domain as tag_value
'子域名' as tag_name, t3.domain as tag, t3.domain as tag_value
'ip' as tag_name, t3.ip as tag, t3.ip as tag_value
'端口' as tag_name, concat(t4.ip,':',t4.PORT) as tag, concat(t4.ip,':',t4.PORT) as tag_value
from scan_project t1
join scan_project_host t2 on t2.project_id = t1.id and t2.del_flg = 0 join scan_host t3 on t3.domain = t2.host and t3.del_flg = 0
join scan_port t4 on t4.ip = t3.ip and t4.del_flg = 0
where t1.del_flg = 0
and t1.user_id = #{params.userId}
and t3.company is not null
and t3.is_major = 0
and t3.ip != '-'
group by
t1.create_time desc
t3.company
t3.parent_domain
t3.domain
t3.ip
t4.ip,t4.port

select
count(distinct t3.company)
count(distinct t3.parent_domain)
count(distinct t3.domain)
count(distinct t3.ip)
count(distinct t4.ip,t4.port)
from scan_project t1 join scan_project_host t2 on t2.project_id = t1.id and t2.del_flg = 0 join scan_host t3 on t3.domain = t2.host and t3.del_flg = 0
join scan_port t4 on t4.ip = t3.ip and t4.del_flg = 0
where t1.del_flg = 0
and t1.user_id = #{params.userId}
and t3.company is not null
and t3.is_major = 0
and t3.ip != '-'

select DISTINCT t1.*, t2.domain, t2.parent_domain, t2.company, t4.name as project_name, u.user_id, u.user_name from scan_port t1 join scan_host t2 on t2.ip = t1.ip and t2.del_flg = 0 join scan_project_host t3 on t3.`host` = t2.domain and t3.del_flg = 0 join scan_project t4 on t4.id = t3.project_id and t4.del_flg = 0 join sys_user u on u.user_id = t4.user_id and u.del_flg = 0 where t1.del_flg = 0
and t4.id = #{params.projectId}
and t4.user_id = #{params.userId}
and t2.company like concat('%', #{params.company}, '%')
and t2.parent_domain like concat('%', #{params.parentDomain}, '%')
and t2.domain like concat('%', #{params.domain}, '%')
and t1.ip like concat('%', #{params.ip}, '%')
and t1.port like concat('%', #{params.port}, '%')
and t1.server_name like concat('%', #{params.serverName}, '%')
order by t1.ip, t1.port

select DISTINCT t1.*, t2.domain, t2.parent_domain, t2.company, t4.name as project_name from scan_port t1 join scan_host t2 on t2.ip = t1.ip and t2.del_flg = 0 join scan_project_host t3 on t3.`host` = t2.domain and t3.del_flg = 0 join scan_project t4 on t4.id = t3.project_id and t4.del_flg = 0 where t1.del_flg = 0
and t4.user_id = #{params.userId}
and t2.company like concat('%', #{params.company}, '%')
and t2.parent_domain like concat('%', #{params.parentDomain}, '%')
and t2.domain like concat('%', #{params.domain}, '%')
and t1.ip like concat('%', #{params.ip}, '%')
and t1.port like concat('%', #{params.port}, '%')
and t1.server_name like concat('%', #{params.serverName}, '%')
order by t1.ip, t1.port
